main_definition: Garbage refers to waste material, particularly that which is no longer useful or desired.

meanings_and_examples.example: The garbage truck came by to collect the weekly refuse.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Something considered worthless, useless, or of poor quality.
meanings_and_examples.example: His excuse was just garbage; I didn't believe a word of it.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A derogatory term used to express contempt towards someone or something perceived as unworthy or undesirable.
meanings_and_examples.example: When he tried to argue, she dismissed his opinions as garbage.
